Text.val: Author: Asaf Kehati
This program was rebuild (09-02-2006 ) according to the new user spesification
23.06.2014 JH SCR18970 Collect invoice information: removed condition in update of v.AACTUALC( and v.INVO_NO(oldest debit invo.)
14.04.2014 JH SCR18828 Removed call of BID004FM if total amount to collect <= 0
06.03.2014 SH SCR18756 Extended autocollaction frequency (11-15) for SEPA
22.01.2012 SH SCR17880 Task "fill in temp table TDIV": Fixed error SQL0338 “JOIN predicate not valid”
22.05.2012 GB SCR17264 Added update the TACO_BANKCOUNTRY=DEBC_BANKCOUNTRY
27.03.2012 JH SCR17143 Added new TACO fields to the Store TEMP_AUTOCOLLECTION tasks
28.11.2011 SH SCR16908 Added test CLNT301_DUNNING = Y in module where temp table TDIV is populated
29.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended INVO_INVOICENO to alpha 20 for sort on INVO
09.05.2011 JH SCR16407 Replaced GB002 by GB9002
06.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
18.11.2009 SH SCR15062 Added PI.BID003.PROGRAM_ID = 'BID004'
31.08.2009 SH SCR14860 Added DEBC_EMP_HANDLING to set v.USER_ID
11.03.2009 GB SCR14481 Extended list of parameters for call BID706
17.08.2008 GB SCR13856 Added call BID004INIT, deleted store a row in the
message queue, added step 5
14.07.2008 EMB SCR12482 Changed direct SQL statement. Insert into contains
field names now.
23.11.2006 AK SCR12032 use GNRL_MARKCODPARTPAYMENT for markcodetext 42
24.10.2006 AK SCR12032 Part payment (MARKCODETEXT=42) should not get a discount
22.05.2006 AK SCR11326 add 3'rd parameter when calling BID706
10.05.2006 AK SCR11206 added USER_ID from bid706 as parameter in BMQ001
18.04.2006 SH SCR10936 Added BPH111.PI.DISCOUNTCREDITNOTES = N
22.03.2006 AK SCR10674 add TACO_DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
15.03.2006 AK SCR: REQ from Theo credit notes get also calculate discounts
(in task - run on invoice (temp table) )
09-02-2006 AK rebuilt the whole program according to the new user spesification
Changes on the old module
on 3.1.2006 WJ SCR10004 call BMQ001 and BXA101 in step 5
16.12.2005 WJ SCR9745 change setting of TACO_HUSR_ID
15.12.2005 AK SCR9788 fix bug see SCR
on 8.6.2005 WJ SCR8398 set variables
07.01.2005 JJ SCR7638 Fixed fetching of DEBH for payment schedules (no locate)
05.01.2005 JJ SCR7620 Fixed where clasue INVOICES ( INVO_DUNNINGSTOP = 'N')
18.08.2003 JJ SCR4082 removed call BMQ001 from step 4 (collection via PAYS)
14.04.2003 JJ SCR3328 added check on MC dispute
10.03.2003 JJ SCR3112 -removed deletion of existing TACO+ MQ
-added check to prevent writing TACO for debtors with pending collections
17.12.2002 JJ req JDO reenabled disabled calls from RS
09.12.2002 SH SCR2518 Step 3 --> Test for every selected invoice if it's already
-handled, if TRUE skip selected invoice
30.10.2002 JJ req JDO changed discount calc. to include not allowed discount
16.09.2002 JJ SCR2162 altered SQL Debtor Clientm and where clause INVOICES
26.07.2002 JJ SCR1600 moved call BID003 from RS to TS
15.07.2002 JJ SCR1629 added initialization of TACO_STATUS and TACO_WAITINGFOR...
11.07.2002 JJ SCR1600 subtree Payment schedule amount:
-Group suffix handling of PAYS_DEBC_NO only when PYSA rows found
-Condition block RS PYSA integrated in where clause/range limits
-TEMP_AUTO... now stored with TACO_OK = 'Y'
-Added call BID003 in RS of task TEMP_AUTO...
General fields
before starting with the selection of new invoices
cleanup the old automatic collections
where the invoices were paid or users are changed
delete old data from temp table
fill the temp table with all outstanding invoices (include dunningstop)
run on list of debtors from the temp table (group by on debtors)
Select PAYMENT SCHEDULES to collect
Rebuild MQ40
-- Normal frequency for auto. collection
... Friday, Saturday or Sunday --> then on Monday
... Monday --> then on Tuesday
... Tuesday --> then on Wednesday
... Wednesday --> then on Thursday
... Thursday --> then on Firday
-- SEPA frequency for auto. collection
... Wednesday --> then on Monday (next week)
... Thursday --> then on Tuesday (next week)
... Friday, Saturday or Sunday --> then on Wednesday (next week)
... Monday --> then on Thursday
... Tuesday --> then on Firday

SQL_STMT_U.val: delete from :1/tdiv where tdiv_callprog = 'BID004' or tdiv_callprog = 'DELETE' or tdiv_callprog = 'DUN_STOP' or tdiv_callprog = 'NOT_TO_COL'

INSERT INTO :1/TDIV ( TDIV_CALLPROG, TDIV_DEBC_NO, TDIV_INVO_NO, TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, TDIV_INVO_DUEDATE) SELECT 'BID004',INVO_DEBC_NO,INVO_NO, INVO_AACTUALC, INVO_DUEDATE FROM :1/INVO cross join :1/DEBC cross join :1/CLNT -- ##### exclude handled and not booked Ivoices ##### exception join :1/BPIV on BPIV_INVO_NO=INVO_NO and (BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null or BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE<'1950-01-01') -- ##### exclude debtors that alredy have row in TEMP_AUTOCOLLECTION ##### exception join :1/TACO on TACO_DEBC_NO=INVO_DEBC_NO and (TACO_TYPE = 4 or TACO_TYPE=1) WHERE DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTPOSSIBLE='Y' and CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO_CLNTNO and CLNT301_DUNNING = 'Y' and
( (DEBC_INCASSOTYPE = 4 and DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ = :4) or (DEBC_INCASSOTYPE <> 4 and DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ = :13) or DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ>15 or DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ<1 or DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ is null OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =1 AND :5 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =2 AND :6 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =3 AND :7 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =4 AND :8 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =6 AND :9 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =7 AND :10 OR DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFREQ =8 AND :11 ) AND
( INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> :12 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 1 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 2 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 3 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 5 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 6 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 9 and (INVO_AUTOMATICINCASSO <= ':2' and DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFIXED=0 or DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONFIXED>0) --INVO_AUTOMATICINCASSO > ':3'
or
INVO_AACTUALI < 0 )
SELECT tdiv_debc_no FROM :1/tdiv WHERE tdiv_callprog = 'BID004' GROUP BY tdiv_debc_no for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: check in-charge user for this debtor
init debtor var's
check total AACTUALC from invoice with DUNNINGSTOP='Y'
and delete these invoices from the temp table
delete credit invoices till the maxsimum amount in v.TOTAL_DUNNINGSTOP_AACTUALC
check the total amount of the invoices for this debtor that are present in the
tem table
if TOTAMOUNT <0 then ther is nothing to charge
if autocollection for this debtor is fixed amount
collect fixed amount (if total outstanding invoices is smaler than fixed amount
then collect only the total outstanding amount
if (amount oldest debit invoice) - (amount all credit invoices) is bigger than
DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONMAX : call BID004FM to charge the maximum allowed amount
Else start storting one TACI row for every debit invoice
as long as the total amount of (all debit invoice - (all charged credit invoice)
<= DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONMAX
mark row for delete (will be physically delete later)
CTRL+H for extra range
(the actual value of the field TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI is INVO_AACTUALC)
mark row for delete, if total amount of deleted rows is not higher than
total amount dunning stop invoices (v.TOTAL_DUNNINGSTOP_AACTUALC)
(the actual value of the field TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI is INVO_AACTUALC)
(the actual value of the field TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI is INVO_AACTUALC)
init TOTAL_AUTOCOLLECT with the total credit invoices
only debit invoices are counted because the credit invoices are counted in
TP already
calculate discount only for debit and credit notes where :
DEBC_INCASSOCONDITION<>4 (neto pay)
if v.TOTAL_AUTOCOLLECT is still not bigger than DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONMAX
or if invoce is a credit invoce : add also the next invoice to TACI
SQL Where Clause:
PAYS-Settled = 'N' and PAYS Autocollection ='Y'
Sorted by DEBC_NO
send a fax
for every row PSYA_DATE<=GNRL_Dayprogramsdate and
PYSA_Paymentsvaluedate = NULL
store one row in TEMP_AUTOCOLLECTION
